intro: Bidens schweinfurthii, commonly known as the Schweinfurth's tickseed, is a flowering plant native to Central America and parts of South America. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features daisy-like flowers with yellow petals and dark brown centers, typically blooming in the summer months. Its leaves are usually alternate, rough to the touch, and have a serrated edge. Bidens schweinfurthii is often found in dry, open habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils.
